titleStmt.title: The declaration of the kingdome of Scotland, concerning the present expedition into England according to the commission and order of the Convention of Estates, from their meeting at Edinburgh, August 1643.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Convention of Estates.

notesStmt.note: This item appears at reels 751:3 and 778:6.
Reproduction of originals in Duke University Library and Huntington Library.
